name: SupportGilliamAndSyrene
_source: speak;Gilliam;Syrene.|...It's been a while.|You look great.
speak;Gilliam;What is it, Syrene?|Is there something on my face?
speak;Syrene;Oh, it's nothing.|Don't worry about it.|You're still one of the best-looking men in Frelia's army.
speak;Gilliam;You know I hate it when you tease me.|What is that smile about?|You're making me very nervous.
speak;Syrene;You were with me on my first mission as one of Frelia's pegasus knight elite.|Do you remember?
speak;Gilliam;Was I really?|I hardly remember.|I have a tough time picturing the famous Syrene as a green recruit.|That really was a long time ago.
speak;Syrene;Oh, really?|What do you mean by that?
speak;Gilliam;Oh, nothing.|Nothing.|Just that you've always been one of Frelia's finest warriors.
speak;Syrene;Gilliam...|This mission matters more to me than that first mission did.
speak;Gilliam;I understand.|Much more hangs in the balance if we fail.
speak;Syrene;We won't fail.|I won't allow it!
speak;Syrene;Thanks, Gilliam.|I'm grateful that you're here with me.
speak;Gilliam;Everything's fine for now, but-|Syrene?|You look pale.|Are you feeling unwell?
speak;Syrene;I'm fine, Gilliam.|Don't worry about me.
speak;Gilliam;...Syrene.|People come to you when they need advice, right?
speak;Syrene;They do, yes.|Why do you ask?|Don't tell me you need some advice from me.
speak;Gilliam;People come to talk to me, too.|Must be...the wisdom of age or something.|But I don't know what to say.|What do you do if you have no advice to give?

speak;Syrene;That happens all the time.|But I've learned something...|People feel better as soon as they let it out.|They just want you to listen.|We're fighting a war.|It's only natural that people get scared and need comfort.
speak;Syrene;...Gilliam.|Is this all just an attempt to probe me for my problems?
speak;Syrene;Don't worry.|If I ever have any problems, I'll be sure to come to you.
speak;Syrene;...Gilliam, you're always telling me to be careful...|You know full well I watch over everyone.|It's what I do.|But you...|You're the one who always watches over me.
speak;Syrene;You know why I stay close to you?|Just to hear you say that.
speak;Gilliam;Is that...all you want to hear me say?
speak;Gilliam;Don't answer now.|When this war is over...|When we get back to Frelia...|Wait until then, will you?|Wait until then to tell me.

speak;Syrene;Gilliam...|You needn't wait that long.|You already know my answer.|...But if that is what you want, Gilliam, then yes!|...I will wait until the war is over before I give my answer! |Gilliam...|Good luck.
